DOC.brief_summary: The aim study validate Korean version Walking Impairment Questionnaire patient peripheral arterial occlusive disease .
DOC.brief_title: Validation Korean Version Walking Impairment Questionnaire Patients With Peripheral Arterial Disease
DOC.detailed_description: First , original version WIQ translate Korean , translate English , . The translated version send original author compare original version . After correct , Korean version complete . The patient peripheral arterial disease fill Korean version WIQ start treatment . Baseline result arterial function test , toe-brachial index treadmill test record . Three month later , patient complete questionnaire . Arterial function test , toe-brachial index treadmill test also take treatment correlation WIQ exams evaluate .
DOC.criteria: 19~ 80 year claudication Ankle brachial index < 0.9 TBI < 0.7 ( patient DM ABI high 1.3 ) patient complete treadmill test ( slope 12 % , 2.4km/hr ) critical limb ischemia Ankle pressure < 40mmHg claudication due cause ( i.e . spinal stenosis , arthritis , etc ) patient high risk coronary artery syndrome treadmill test
